data.eml:eml: Uroptychus minutus Benedict, 1902 and a closely related new species (Crustacea: Anomura: Chirostylidae) from the western Atlantic Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baba, Keiji, Wicksten, Mary (2015): Uroptychus minutus Benedict, 1902 and a closely related new species (Crustacea: Anomura: Chirostylidae) from the western Atlantic Ocean. Zootaxa 3957 (2): 215-225, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3957.2.5
